episode_summary: This episode covers a variety of quirky and fascinating topics, including world records for unusual feats, a prolific bear in the Pyrenees, Poland's official ghost hunter, and the use of Cold War fallout in solving crimes.

facts.fact: The world record for most kicks to one's own head is 127 in a minute.
There is a bear in the Pyrenees who is facing castration because he has fathered nearly all the other bears.
Poland's only official ghost hunter thinks that ghosts have given up on haunting humans.
Fallout from the Cold War has been used to solve murders.
